body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Fluid Twill Tiered Fit and Flare Dress
features: FIT & FLARE: Fitted through chest and waist, flared to hem.

DRAPEY FLUID TWILL: Made of 100% viscose, our non stretch viscose is extremely breathable and lightweight. With a beautiful drape and a soft, smooth finish, this fabric is comfortable and easy to wear all year round.

ESSENTIAL SUMMER DRESS: This versatile and figure-flattering dress seamlessly transitions from day to night. Pair with your favorite sneakers for a day exploring the city or dress up for an evening out with Amazon Essentials Women's Two Strap Heeled Sandals.
DETAILS: Features wide straps, elastic waist, side seam invisible zipper, and a feminine, gathered tier creating beautiful drape and movement. The perfect midi length.
LENGTH: 48" from side neck on US size S.

ADDITIONAL FABRIC & CARE INFORMATION: Due to the delicate nature of viscose fabric, we recommend you wash it in cold water and hang dry to prevent fabric shrinkage and wrinkles caused by any extra heat. Gently iron or steam for an even crisper, polished look.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort. productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #3,184 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #579 in Women's Casual Dresses

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’5, 154 lbs, bigger bust and the Large hangs on me beautifully. This size is perfect for frame: loose enough to be casual but not so billowy or unfitted that it appears sloppy. I have enough room in it around my 38 band size that I’m not worried about putting it in the wash at though I do plan to only hang it to dry. The fabric is super soft and the dress is well made-I see no loose strings or irregular seams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great if you get your size right and the right for you color
reviews.reviewText: I have this dress in 3 different colors, the white with dots, navy and the green pattern. Initially I ordered the pink and white together and I am so glad I did because I could compare. I hated the pink and loved the white. Had I only ordered the pink one, I would've thought this dress was not for me. But the moment I put on the white one, I was shocked at how much I loved it, since I absolutely hated the pink one. So you just have to try different ones to really know. Size wise I'm usually a M rarely L in stores dresses, but mostly L in Amazon dresses. I got L and it is comfortably loose so that I don't have to use the zipper and just pull it over my head, but it's not too big on me. I use a skinny tan belt and tan sandals and it looks really good. I think if you have to use the zipper then you're in an incorrect size and need to size up.I also tried the blue stripe and it was much too narrow on me in the hips, so it runs a smaller than the other colors I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon size recommendation was right
reviews.reviewText: 5'10", 155 lb, and broad shoulders. I typically need a large for my shoulders, and ordered both medium and large based on Amazon recommendation. The medium is fitted up top, but comfortable and flattering. The large was just too big, didn't sit right in the top and the elastic waistline drooped in an unflattering way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sad I had to return.
reviews.reviewText: These looked so cute on line. I ordered the yellow/pink and the blue/white striped. I was disappointed in the fabric, but I didn't know what "flurry" twill was. I expected a heavier fabric. The dresses were very wrinkled, even after hanging for a few days. I received the yellow first and tried it on. It was a little snug below the elastic waist and clung in an odd way. After I received the blue one I almost didn't even try it on, but I did. It wasn't snug like the yellow one. I checked and both were size small. Although the blue one fit, it wasn't a good style on me.The part of the dress between the elastic waist and the tier seem at the bottom is basically straight rather than A -line, which I thought.The photos are not great, but you can see a bit of size difference between the two.For reference, I am 5'9" and 125lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good summer dress
reviews.reviewText: Cloth is soft. And very pretty summer dress. Pair it with sneakers and denim jacket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Summer dress midi length
reviews.reviewText: My order arrived 2 days after ordering! I am 5’ and 123 lbs and wanted a summer dress that was below knee length. Even though this dress did not come in petite sizes, I purchased it any way thinking I could return it if it was too long. I was pleasantly surprised that even though it was longer than midi for a petite frame, it wasn’t maxi in length . It was comfortable and modest in style yet still definitely a summer dress. I am keeping it and plan to buy another one in one of the many prints available for this dress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great color and design but horrible fit!! The straps were way too long and couldn’t adjust them! The style made you look pregnant.. if you’re about a size 2.. it would be adorable if you could deal with straps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This arrived quickly and was the color I wanted. The good things about this dress: it has pockets, it is a decent length, and the fabric is soft. The bad things about this dress: the top is too tight, it wrinkles easily, and the straps are not adjustable. I have now washed it, air dried it and was forced to iron it, but it still didn't fit the way I wanted (despite trying several bra options). For reference, I normally wear a size 8/36C and the Medium was smashing across the front. It had potential for a great dress, but it was not made for me.

I got the green with tiny flowers and it's beautiful for a garden party or wedding but I also paired it with some boots and a jean jacket for a concert and it gives some great 90's vibes. Nice material and length. The sizing is accurate as well.
La tela es ligera. No se transparenta. Es muy cómodo, ya que queda suelto. El escote queda a una perfecta altura. Definitivamente un “must” en tu closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the fit and the style. It is easy to get on and off. The quality is brilliant and is good to dress up or down. It washes well. I am very pleased with this dress. 😊
Abito estivo semplice, dal tessuto molto morbido e leggero, fresco e molto comodoPerfetto per le giornate d'estate, per una passeggiata, per andare al mare
